overview: Dangun’s last descendant lives in the present world. However, because the reckless use of force is taboo, they’re doing ‘bread shuttle number one at school. If you can’t avoid it, enjoy it… As he was being patient and patient, he decided to be the number one shuttle and eventually became Nambawan.  But now is the time to break the taboo to protect his family and loved ones. The story of Dan’s family, who desperately practices the ideology of Hongik Ingan from various gods, evil spirits, demons, and his descendants to take away the God of heaven, cheon-buin, unfolds.
title: Dan’s Family No. 1
